      • setFailureAction

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setFailureAction(ApplyTypes.FailureAction failureAction)
        What action is to be taken if entering maintenance mode fails on a given host of the cluster. If null, configured value would be unset.
        Parameters:
        failureAction - New value for the property.

      • setPreRemediationPowerAction

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setPreRemediationPowerAction(ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.PreRemediationPowerAction preRemediationPowerAction)
        Specifies what should be done to the power state of the VM before entering maintenance mode. If null, configured value would be unset.
        Parameters:
        preRemediationPowerAction - New value for the property.

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setEvacuateOfflineVms(java.lang.Boolean evacuateOfflineVms)
        Evacuate powered off/suspended VMs when attempting maintenance mode. If null, configured value would be unset.
        Parameters:
        evacuateOfflineVms - New value for the property.

      • setEnforceHclValidation

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setEnforceHclValidation(java.lang.Boolean enforceHclValidation)
        Enforce Hcl validation, when applicable, to prevent remediation if hardware compatibility issues are found. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.1.0. If null, hardware compatibility issues will not prevent remediation.
        Parameters:
        enforceHclValidation - New value for the property.

      • setParallelRemediationAction

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setParallelRemediationAction(ApplyTypes.ParallelRemediationAction parallelRemediationAction)
        Enable parallel remediation of hosts in maintenance mode. Set max hosts when applicable. This property was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1. If null, parallel remediation will not happen.
        Parameters:
        parallelRemediationAction - New value for the property.

      • setEnforceQuickPatch

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setEnforceQuickPatch(java.lang.Boolean enforceQuickPatch)
        Enforce quick patch on the cluster for images that support it. This property was added in vSphere API 8.0.3.0. If null, configured value would be unset.
        Parameters:
        enforceQuickPatch - New value for the property.

      • setConfigManagerPolicySpec

        public ApplyTypes.ConfiguredPolicySpec.Builder setConfigManagerPolicySpec(ConfigManagerPolicySpec configManagerPolicySpec)
        Configure settings applicable to the com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.Configuration.apply API. This property was added in vSphere API 8.0.3.0. If null, configured values will be unset.
        Parameters:
        configManagerPolicySpec - New value for the property.
